All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminBrowseEventsFragment
This class is used to display all existing events in the admin interface (based on data in Firestore).
AdminBrowseImagesFragment
This class is used to display all existing images in the admin interface (based on data in Firestore).
AdminBrowseUsersFragment
This class is used to display all existing users in the admin interface (based on data in Firestore).
AdminHomeFragment
This class is used to display the homepage of Admin interface (based on data in Firestore).
Announcement
This class represents an announcement object.
AnnouncementAdapter
Adapter for displaying announcements.
Attendee
This class represents an attendee object.
AttendeeAdapter
Adapter for displaying attendees in a ListView.
AttendeeUnitTest
 
BrowseEventDetailsActivity
This class is used to display event details for events launched from the Browse Events page.
BrowseEventsFragment
This class is used to display all existing events (based on data in Firestore).
CheckedInUsersFragment
A fragment to display the list of checked-in users for an event.
CreatedEventDetailsActivity
This class is used to display details of events the user has registered for or created.
CreatedEventsFragment
This class is used to display a user's created events.
CreateEventActivity
This class is used for when a user wants to create an event.
EditProfileActivity
This class is used to edit an already existing user's profile.
Event
This class represents an event.
EventAdapter
Adapter for displaying events in a ListView.
EventDetailsActivityTest
 
EventUnitTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FirebaseManager
Manages interactions with Firebase Firestore.
FirebaseManager.AttendeesCallback
Callback interface for Firestore operations with attendees.
FirebaseManager.CheckInCountCallback
Callback interface for Firestore operations with an event's check-in count.
FirebaseManager.EventCallback
Callback interface for Firestore operations with a single event.
FirebaseManager.EventsCallback
Callback interface for Firestore operations with events.
FirebaseManager.URLCallback
Callback interface for Firestore operations with URLs.
FirebaseManager.UserDocumentCallback
Callback interface for Firestore operations with user documents.
FullScreenImageActivity
This class is used to display an image in full screen mode.
GenerateQRActivity
This class is used to generate QR codes for a particular event using a unique eventID.
GenerateQRActivityTest
 
GuestlistActivity
This class is used to display the registered users for a given event.
ImageAdapter
Adapter for displaying images in a ListView.
ImageManager
This class is used to manage images with Firebase Cloud Storage.
ImageManager.ImagesCallback
Interface for asynchronous callback when retrieving images.
MainActivity
The main activity of the application.
MakeProfileActivity
This class is used for when a user wants to make profile a.k.a.
MakeProfileActivityTest
 
MapViewActivity
This class displays a map view with markers representing checked-in attendees of an event.
MyFirebaseMessagingService
This class is used for Firebase Messaging ordeals.
ProfileFragment
This class is used to manage what page is displayed when the user navigates to the Profile tab.
RegisteredEventDetailsActivity
This class is used to display event details for events launched from the Attending Events page.
RegisteredEventsFragment
This class is used to display a user's registered events.
RegisteredUsersFragment
A fragment to display the list of registered users for an event.
ReuseQRActivity
This is a class used for reusing existing QR codes for Check-in.
ScanQRActivity
This is a class used for scanning QR codes.
SendNotificationActivity
This class handles notification sending from the organizer to the attendees of their event.
SendNotificationActivityTest
 
StartupProfileFragment
A fragment for handling startup profile details.
TempUserInfoActivity
This activity allows the user to input temporary user information.
UserDetailsActivity
This class is used to display details of a user.
UserProfileFragment
This class displays a user's profile information.
YourEventsFragment
This class is used to display a user's registered events.
